Combo.Name: Life Seeking Arrow
Effects: Hit or miss, foe must also sacrifice 25% of their max hp.

Actions.Name: Kick Off
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 1. Before they fly, they may shove an adjacent character 1 space, then deal 2 damage to them if they are a foe. If they do, they fly 3 instead.

Actions.Name: Liminal Darts
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in line of sight and range 10. At the end of that character's turn, it takes [D] piercing damage if it's not in cover from the [name], or just 2 piercing damage if it is. Then this mark ends.
